charges.charge_description: Knowingly and unlawfully possessing in and affecting commerce, a firearm, to wit: Lorcin, model L25,.25 caliber pistol, serial number 026563, after Johnny Lee Hogan had been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, to wit: Indecency with a child, a felony, in the 185th District Court of Harris County, in cause number 582090, in violation of Title 18 United States Code, Section(s) 922(g)(1) [6:00-m-53]
